description: Prosecutors earlier decided the Khachaturyan sisters suffered prolonged physical and sexual abuse.
title: Russia Khachaturyan sisters: Investigators refuse to drop murder case
title_page: Russia Khachaturyan sisters: Investigators refuse to drop murder case - BBC News
maintext: Their mother, who had been forced to flee the family home for her own safety, has previously told the BBC that she and others complained to police multiple times over the years about the violence but were ignored.
